thread.title: Yunus Arslan

author: Yunus Arslan
title: Yunus Arslan
text:
you guys this company is terrible,they have customer care but they dont care about anything..ı just wanted to change my ticket with them for other flight they keep me on the line 220 minutes and ı made this call out of country and it cost me 180 us dollar..they just waste my time and my money..
DO NOT BOOK ANYTHİNG WİTH THEM.THEY DO NOT KNOW WHAT THEY ARE DOİNG!!!
